title: Kaleidoscope
summaries: The Kaleidoscope is a post-Plantera whip that has a 25*1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by the Empress of Light boss.

Like other whips, it causes <linked>minions</linked> to focus on the last-struck <linked>enemy</linked> and increases their damage against the target. Uniquely, it also grant the minions the ability to deal <linked>critical hits</linked> to struck enemies at a fixed 10% chance.
If the Kaleidoscope hits multiple targets in a single attack, the damage dealt by each consecutive hit will be reduced by 10%.
